```{r}
Data <- read.csv("data.csv")
```
```{r}
str(Data)
```

## Loading packages
```{r}
library(BiocManager)
library(Biostrings)
library(reshape2)
library(rentrez)
library(annotate)
library(ape)
library(ggtree)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tree)
library(randomForest)
library(gbm)
```

## Mutating data
```{r}
data<-Data %>% 
  mutate(diagnosis = as.factor(diagnosis))
```
```{r}
diagData<-data %>% 
  select(-c("id","X"))
```

## Making regression tree
```{r}
DiagTree<-tree(diagnosis ~ ., data=diagData)
plot(DiagTree)
text(DiagTree, cex=0.6, adj=0)
```

## Seeing the influence parameters have on diagnosis

```{r}
set.seed(123)
DiagBoost<-gbm(diagnosis ~ ., data=diagData, distribution="gaussian", n.trees=25, interaction.depth=2, cv.folds=12)
summary(DiagBoost)
```
